.: Plot :.

A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age. Harry Sanborn is an aged music industry exec with a fondness for younger women like Marin, his latest trophy girlfriend. Things get a little awkward when Harry suffers a heart attack at the home of Marin's mother Erica. Left in the care of Erica and his doctor, a love triangle starts to take shape.
